data: CARD SURG Post Operative Pain and Symptom Management
Do not initiate this PowerPlan if Acute Pain Service (APS), Perioperative Pain Service (POPS) or Anesthesiology is following this patient
Order for Duplicate Checking, do not modify
650 mg, PO, QID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: tab
975 mg, PO, QID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: tab
dose range: 325 to 650 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
650 mg, rectal, q6h, drug form: supp

NSAIDs contraindicated if:
- eGFR is below 60 mL/min (below 75 mL/min in diabetic patients)
- Platelets below 50 x 10^9/L
- Initial chest tube losses are greater than 350 mL
- Patient has history of asthma
- Patient has heart failure (EF below 40%)
